ear.name: ear
ear.transformationDescription:
They quickly recede into small holes while a chitin plating grows over to protect them.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [style.boldSpider(internal, spider-like ears)], which are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.earFullDescription].
ear.bodyDescription: [npc.She] [npc.has] a pair of internal ears, which are positioned on the sides of [npc.her] head and are concealed by#IF(npc.isPiercedEar()) pierced#ENDIF [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.earFullDescription(true)].
